snippet: The union-backed Making Change at Walmart campaign said that protests on Tuesday affected 28 stores in 12 states, after what it called a strike in California last week.
abstract: Union-backed Making Change at Wal-Mart campaign says protests against company have expanded, affecting 28 stores in 12 states; in an effort to increase pressure on the retailer as the holiday season approaches, 88 employees at the stores reportedly missed work.
lead_paragraph: The union-backed Making Change at Walmart campaign said that protests on Tuesday affected 28 stores in 12 states, after what it called a strike in California last week.

headline.seo: Organizers Say Wal-Mart Labor Protests Spread
headline.main: Wal-Mart Labor Protests Grow, Organizers Say
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Labor Protests Grow, Organizers Say
